Utilities

Learn how to build your website with boba!

Spacing

Hassle-free spacing classes to make perfect positioning painless.
Content Spacing
.main-content Add a comfortable amount of padding to a top-level, content-containing element.
Spacing Resets
.no-margin Removes all margin from an element.
.no-padding Removes all padding from an element.
